content: have you ever tried interlocking filet mesh with diagonals download this free pattern and follow along on youtube to start on this coaster here interlocking filet mesh from start to diagonals 1 the video tutorial shows the coaster row-by-row through row 9 to give a good representation of the diagonals worked in every direction as well as how to work around them **finished size ** 5 wide x 5-1/2 high **yardage ** 100 yds each of 2 colors this pattern is written in u s terms 1 https //youtu be/tz8pymmqnxu
